text: tana manovanchalanu tana daivanga cesukunna vanini nivu cusava? Mariyu atadu jnanavantudu ayinappatiki, allah! Atanini margabhrastatvanlo vadiladu mariyu atani cevula mida mariyu atani hrdayam mida mudra vesadu mariyu atani kalla mida teravesadu; ika allah tappa ataniki margadarsakatvam cese vadevadunnadu? Idi miru grahincalera
